Name: Alexander The Great
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
7.5 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: A creamy combination of vodka-laced coffee and chocolate. (The optional egg white adds body but there's no need to dry shake .)
History: Adapted from a recipe in Lucius Beebe's 1946 The Stork Club Bar Book . where this cocktail is described as " An improvement, as some may think, on the conventional Alexander cocktail ," and is credited to a bartender called Nelson Eddy.
Nutrition: One serving of Alexander The Great contains 231 calories
